actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution to provide that no reprieve or pardon shall be granted until after the filing of an indictment or the formal commencement of other criminal action.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that no reprieve or pardon shall be granted until after the filing of an indictment or the formal commencement of other criminal action with respect to that offense.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution to provide that no reprieve or pardon shall be granted until after the filing of an indictment or the formal commencement of other criminal action.
